meaningMnemonic: You find a <radical>cross</radical> in the <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>wolverine</radical>. What a strange <kanji>occurrence</kanji>. Why would someone do such a <kanji>thing</kanji>? This is a <kanji>matter</kanji> you want nothing to do with, so you'd better move along.
readingMnemonic: This occurrence doesn't impress <reading>Je</reading>sus (じ), who appears and gently removes the cross from the wolverine's mouth.
